DLMtool 5.1.999
  • User Guide
  • Management Procedures

Reference

Output Controls

Management Procedures that return a total allowable catch (TAC)

AvC()

Average Catch

BK() BK_CC() BK_ML()

Beddington and Kirkwood life-history MP

CC1() CC2() CC3() CC4() CC5()

Geromont and Butterworth (2015) Constant Catch

CompSRA() CompSRA4010()

Age-Composition Stock-Reduction Analysis

DCACs() DCAC() DCAC_40() DCAC4010() DCAC_ML() DAAC() HDAAC()

Depletion Corrected Average Catch

DBSRA() DBSRA_40() DBSRA4010()

Depletion-Based Stock Reduction Analysis

DDe() DDes() DDe75() DD() DD4010()

Delay - Difference Stock Assessment with UMSY and MSY as leading parameters

DepF() Fratio() Fratio4010() Fratio_CC() Fratio_ML()

An FMSY/M ratio method

DynF()

Dynamic Fratio MP

Fadapt()

An adaptive MP that uses trajectory in inferred suplus production and fishing mortality rate to update a TAC

Fdem() Fdem_CC() Fdem_ML()

Demographic FMSY method

GB_CC()

Geromont and Butterworth Constant Catch Harvest Control Rule

GB_slope()

Geromont and Butterworth index slope Harvest Control Rule

GB_target()

Geromont and Butterworth target CPUE and catch MP

Gcontrol()

G-control MP

Islope1() Islope4()

A management procedure that incrementally adjusts the TAC to maintain a constant CPUE or relative abundance index

IT5() IT10()

Index Target Management Procedure

ItargetE1() ItargetE4() Itarget1() Itarget4()

A management procedure that incrementally adjusts the TAC (starting from reference level that is a fraction of mean recent catches) or effort (from a reference level) to reach a target CPUE / relative abundance index

ITM()

Index Target based on natural mortality rate

L95target()

A management procedure that adjusts the TAC up/down from reference (target) level (that is a fraction of mean recent premanagement catches) to reach a target mean length of fish caught.

LstepCE1() LstepCE2() LstepCC1() LstepCC4()

A management procedure that incrementally adjusts the TAC or effort according to the mean length of recent catches.

LtargetE1() LtargetE4() Ltarget1() Ltarget4()

A management procedure that incrementally adjusts the TAC or effort to reach a target mean length in catches.

MCD() MCD4010()

Mean Catch Depletion

Rcontrol() Rcontrol2()

Harvest Control Rule using prior for intrinsic rate of increase

SBT1()

SBT simple MP

SBT2()

SBT complex MP

SPmod()

Surplus production based catch-limit modifier

SPMSY()

Catch trend Surplus Production MSY MP

SPslope()

Slope in surplus production MP

SPSRA() SPSRA_ML()

Surplus Production Stock Reduction Analysis

YPR() YPR_CC() YPR_ML()

Yield Per Recruit analysis to get FMSY proxy F01

Input Controls

Management Procedures that return a total allowable effort (TAE), spatial closure, or size regulation

curE() curE75()

Fishing at current effort levels

DDe() DDes() DDe75() DD() DD4010()

Delay - Difference Stock Assessment with UMSY and MSY as leading parameters

DTe40()

Effort searching MP aiming for 40 per cent stock depletion

DTe50()

Effort searching MP aiming for 50 per cent stock depletion

EtargetLopt()

Effort MP: adjust effort up/down if mean length above/below Ltarget

ItargetE1() ItargetE4() Itarget1() Itarget4()

A management procedure that incrementally adjusts the TAC (starting from reference level that is a fraction of mean recent catches) or effort (from a reference level) to reach a target CPUE / relative abundance index

ITe10()

Index Target Effort-Based 10

ITe5()

Index Target Effort-Based 5

LstepCE1() LstepCE2() LstepCC1() LstepCC4()

A management procedure that incrementally adjusts the TAC or effort according to the mean length of recent catches.

LtargetE1() LtargetE4() Ltarget1() Ltarget4()

A management procedure that incrementally adjusts the TAC or effort to reach a target mean length in catches.

matlenlim() matlenlim2() minlenLopt1() slotlim()

Size limit management procedures

MRreal() MRnoreal()

Spatial closure and allocation management procedures

Mixed Controls

Management Procedures that return a combination of Output and Input controls

AvC_MLL()

Average Catch with a size limit

Itarget1_MPA()

A example mixed control MP that uses the Itarget1 output control MP together with a spatial closure.

Reference

Management Procedures used as Performance References

FMSYref() FMSYref50() FMSYref75() NFref()

Reference management procedures

Contents

  • Output Controls
  • Input Controls
  • Mixed Controls
  • Reference
